sentence.Network_en: Its low temperature form is rhombohedral with an elongation along ( 111 ).
sentence.Network_cn: 它的低温形态是沿着[111 ] 伸长的菱面体.

sentence.Network_en: It crystallises in colorless rhombohedral with a relative density of 1.95.
sentence.Network_cn: 高氯酸铵是一种无色菱形晶体,相对密度1.95.

sentence.Network_en: It indicates that the Nd 2 AlFe 14 Mn 2 compound has a rhombohedral Th 2 Zn 17 - type structure from 104 to 655 K.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究结果表明,Nd2AlFe14Mn2化合物在104-655K具有菱方相的Th2Zn17型结构.
